titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation for the avoyding of all intercourse betweene His Maiesties Royall Court and the cities of London and Westminster, and places adioyning
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By I.L. and W.T. for Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill ...,

notesStmt.note: "Giuen at our Court at Salisbury the seuenteenth day of October, in the first yeare of our raigne of Great Brittaine, France, and Ireland."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.
